nodes.bodyText: We should audit our code for usage of PARENT_PATH because as this code shows it's now meaningless in some cases so we may as well try avoid using it completely (and replace it with something else depending on needs)
Hm actually it's even worse, for the moveDocument case the value is a DocumentRef and not a String... and this is used by quotas...

Could you use DocumentModel#setPropertyValue and DocumentModel#getPropertyValue?
I know the class mix both, but let's add "correct" code :)
